Summary: Large High Alititude Upright cylidrical looking flashing - multi-coloured light
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Vernon
There was one other sighting in Vernon on or around July 25th 2008
divs: sighting detailsunfortiunately i could not see a solid object, other than a upright cylidrical looking flashing - multi-coloured light. but it was big and extremely bright. i work for a motel in vernon, bc, and spend a lot of time outside in the parking lot during my evening shifts. i have seen strange things in the skies here since may, 2008, so i started carrying my small digital camera everywhere i go. i live in a condo attached to the motel, and this particular night was the second in a row of seeing this object, so i ran to grab my video camera, (which i had ready to go just in case), and starting filming. i will attach a link to my posting on youtube, since it would take forever to upload again - its a 222 mb avi file. its just easier to give you a link if thats okay:-) http:\\youtube.com\watch?v=7kuwsuqe8au have a great day, gary :-)
